Title: He Gone
Writer: Sam Catlin (developed by), Seth Rogen (developed by), Evan Goldberg (developed by), Garth Ennis (based on the graphic novels by), Steve Dillon (based on the graphic novels by), Mary Laws
Actors: Dominic Cooper, Joseph Gilgun, Ruth Negga, Lucy Griffiths
Plot: Jesse's actions endanger and alienate those closest to him; a glimpse into his past reveals the root of all of his guilt.
